SQL: select DataSets.ObjectID, Datasets.Type, DataSetID from GameObjects inner join DataSets on GameObjects.ObjectID = DataSets.ObjectID where GameObjects.GameID=@GameID and DataSet=@DataSet

select DataSets.ObjectID, Datasets.Type, DataSetID from GameObjects inner join DataSets on GameObjects.ObjectID = DataSets.ObjectID where GameObjects.Type=@ExtraData and GameObjects.GameID=@GameID and DataSet=@DataSet

select DataSets.ObjectID, Datasets.Type, DataSetID, 1 as IsDelta from GameObjects inner join DataSets on GameObjects.ObjectID = DataSets.ObjectID where GameObjects.Type=@ExtraData and GameObjects.GameID=@GameID and DataSet=@DataSet
select DataSets.ObjectID, Datasets.Type, DataSetID from GameObjects inner join DataSets on GameObjects.ObjectID = DataSets.ObjectID where GameObjects.PlayerObjectID=@ObjectID and DataSet=@DataSet

select DataSets.ObjectID, Datasets.Type, DataSetID from GameObjects inner join DataSets on GameObjects.ObjectID = DataSets.ObjectID where GameObjects.Type=@ExtraData and GameObjects.PlayerObjectID=@ObjectID and DataSet=@DataSet

select DataSets.ObjectID, Datasets.Type, DataSetID, 1 as IsDelta from GameObjects inner join DataSets on GameObjects.ObjectID = DataSets.ObjectID where GameObjects.Type=@ExtraData and GameObjects.PlayerObjectID=@ObjectID and DataSet=@DataSet
